thread.title: Cleomie
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Cleomie

author: Cleomie
title: Cleomie
text: Kristen was so helpful and knowledgeable of the stock and products. Customer service was very commendable ! She never got aggravated even with my frequent change of mind. She was able to help us to the very end and went out of her way to make sure we were satisfied customers !
